headline: Senior Firearms Instructor
summary:
Former U.S. Army Infantryman.  Spent eight years between active duty and National Guard.  Deployed to the Middle East for combat duties during Operation Desert Shield and Desert Storm.  Served as Machine Gunner, Radio Operator, Team Leader, Squad Leader and Training NCO.  

I left the Military and went into Law Enforcement as a part time Corrections Officer with the Essex County Sheriff's Department and then left for a full time position with the Hillsborough County DOC.  Currently work for DHS / ICE.

I also currently work as a EMT-B adjunct instructor for the New England EMS Institute.

Specialties: EMT-B; Pistol, Rifle and Shotgun Instructor; Tactics; Use of Force training.

defaultPosition.description: Part time pistol instructor at SIG Sauer Academy.
